content: चंडाल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चंड्-आलच्] {@--1@} Wicked or cruel in deeds, of black deeds ( क्रूरकर्मन्); <ab>cf.</ab> कर्मचाडाल. --लः A general name for the lowest and most despised of the mixed castes originating from a Śūdra father and a Brāhmaṇa mother. {@--2@} A man of this caste, an outcast, चंडालः किमयं द्विज तिरथवा <ls>Bh. 3. 56</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 131</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">10. 12</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">16</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">11. 176.</ls>
